content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup Company, announced today they are expanding capabilities and their facility in Titusville, Fla.

The 20,000 square-foot expansion which is expected to take approximately six months to complete will accommodate the growth of the company’s landing gear service area, accessory shop, instrument and avionics lab as well as an expanded machine shop and paint shop.

“We are extremely pleased to be able to increase our production footprint in Titusville,” said President of Professional Aircraft Accessories Robert Bial. “This expansion is a direct result of the increasing customer demand that we have seen over the past several years and our desire to building lasting and value-added partnerships with our customers.”

Professional Aircraft Accessories which has been located on the main runway at Space Coast Regional Airport (TIX) in Titusville since 2003 currently runs two full time shifts in their 40,000 square-foot facility. Bial said they anticipate adding 50 additional employees over the next two years.
